graph.packing

Class BBNode1

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.packing.BBNodeBase
      • graph.packing.BBNode1
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable, java.lang.Runnable

    class BBNode1
extends BBNodeBase
    represents a node in the B & B tree of the hybrid B & B - GASP scheme for the 1-packing problem (max weighted independent set problem). It extends BBNodeBase, as BBNode1 objects enter a priority queue (BBQueue) from which nodes are selected for processing (passing them to the BBThreadPool that is a proxy for a parallel.FasterParallelAsynchBatchTaskExecutor executor).

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2015

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

      guard member to ensure the value of _ff doesn't change after BBNode1 objects are created.
      private static NodeSetWeightComparator _nscomtor
      comparator between node-sets used in sorting node-sets in the getBestNodeSets2Add() method if the appropriate option in the parameters of the calling program is set.

    • Field Detail

      • _ff

        private static double _ff
        defines a multiplicative fudge factor by which the "best cost" of graph-nodes is allowed to be "over" so as to still be considered "best" for inclusion in the getBestNodes2Add(BBNode1) method and further consideration. This value is allowed to change until a call to disallowFFChanges() is made by any thread.

      • _ffAllowed2Change

        private static boolean _ffAllowed2Change
        guard member to ensure the value of _ff doesn't change after BBNode1 objects are created.

      • _nscomtor

        private static NodeSetWeightComparator _nscomtor
        comparator between node-sets used in sorting node-sets in the getBestNodeSets2Add() method if the appropriate option in the parameters of the calling program is set. This sorting only makes sense when children BBNode1 objects will be "cut" short due to flags set to guide the search process.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BBNode1

        BBNode1(BBTree master,
        java.util.Set r,
        BBNode1 parent)
 throws PackingException
        Sole constructor of a BBNode1 object. Clients are not expected to create such objects which are instead created dynamically through the B&B process.
        Parameters:
        master - BBTree the master BBTree object of which this is a node.
        r - Set // Set<Node> the set of (graph) nodes to be added to the nodes of the parent to represent a new partial solution.
        parent - BBNode1 the parent BB-node in the B&B tree construction process.
        Throws:
        PackingException - if the second argument is non-null but the third argument is null.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        the main method of the class, that processes the partial solution represented by this object, and spawning and pushing into the BBQueue queue new BB-node children if needed. Note:
        2015-02-09 modified children nodes cutting-off behavior to be turned off if this BBNode is the root node, in accordance with the change to let the root node return immediately all possible best graph-nodes as independent starting singleton sets (equivalent to having kmax=0 for the root node) which should result in better parallel processing throughput.
        2015-02-10 improved performance of the isFeas() and isFree2Cover() methods - now also avoid unnecessary HashMap objects creation.

      • getBound

        protected double getBound()
        compute a max possible number of nodes weights this soln can have. One such bound is _nodes.sum_weights + (gsz - getForbiddenNodes().size())*max_open_node_weight/2
        Specified by:
        getBound in class BBNodeBase
        Returns:
        double

      • disallowFFChanges

        static void disallowFFChanges()
        disallow changes to _ff. Called only from the BBGASPAcker class.

      • setFF

        set the value of _ff field. Called only from the BBGASPPacker class, before any BBNode1 objects are constructed or executed on threads.
        Parameters:

      • getLevel

        final int getLevel()
        it is interesting to reason as to why this method is correct in terms of memory visibility even without any locks/synchronization.
        Returns:
        the depth of this BBNode1 object in the BBTree.

      • getBestNodeSets2Add

        private java.util.Set getBestNodeSets2Add()
                                   throws ParallelException
        return Set<Set<Node> > of all maximal nodesets that can be added together to the current active _nodes set. Note:
        2014-07-22 modified Vector store to ArrayList store to enhance multi-threading speed.
        2015-02-09 root node returns immediately with collection of singleton free nodes as sets to enhance multi-threading speed.
        Returns:
        Set // Set<Set<Node> >
        Throws:
        ParallelException - never

      • getBestNodes2Add

        private java.util.Set getBestNodes2Add(boolean isroot)
                                throws ParallelException
        return the Set<Node> that are the best node(s) to add given the current active _nodes set. This is the set of nodes that are free to cover, have max. weight (within the fudge factor _ff), and have the least weight of "free" NBors() (again within the same fudge factor). Alternatively, if the "useGWMIN2criterion" flag is true, the "GWMIN2" heuristic criterion is utilized, so that the free nodes that are within _ff times from the maximum value of the quantity $w_n / \Sum_{v \in N^+_n}w_v$ form the return set.
        Parameters:
        isroot - boolean if true then _ff is set to zero, so that all non-forbidden nodes with min. sum of neighbors-weights are returned.
        Returns:
        Set // Set<Node>
        Throws:
        ParallelException

      • isFree2Cover

        private static boolean isFree2Cover(Node nj,
                                    java.util.Set active)
        check if node nj can be set to one when the nodes in active are also set.
        Parameters:
        nj - Node
        active - Set // Set<Node>
        Returns:
        boolean true iff nj can be added to active

      • isFeas

        private boolean isFeas(java.util.Set nodes)
        check if the nodes parameter can be added to the current active set of nodes represented by this BBNode1 object.
        Parameters:
        nodes - Set // Set<Node>
        Returns:
        boolean true iff nodes can be added to the current solution

      • isFeas

        private static boolean isFeas(java.util.Set c1,
                              java.util.Set c2)
        check if c1 conflicts with c2, in that there exist n1 \in c1 that is a neighbor of some n2 \in c2. Notice that the method assumes that both c1 and c2 are currently feasible, ie the calls isFeas(c1) and isFeas(c2) must return true.
        Parameters:
        c1 - Set // Set<Node>
        c2 - Set // Set<Node>
        Returns:
        boolean false iff c1 U nbors(c1) contain any of c2.

        private java.lang.String printNodes()
